website_summaries.verdict: An affordable way to care for your senior dog's nutritional needs. Made by a popular brand in pet food.
pros: An upgrade from other Purina products
Includes foods created to ease digestion
Helps improve energy levels in older dogs
Dogs seem to enjoy the taste and the smell
cons: The bite size is small, which can be good for older dogs, but doesn't give a lot of chew time

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chunks of Chicken
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have aged and it was time to move them onto the senior formula. We were using the Costco branded chicken flavor dog food before this, so that was a bit cheaper per serving but they do not make a senior diet formula so onto Purina One we go. This style of food has chunks of chicken and smaller kibble than the Costco food so that suits my little 15 pound dog a bit better. My Wife is a Vet Tech and she says this is one of the better mass foods out there, even better than the non prescription brands her hospital sells. I trust her expertise so my two older dogs feast on Purina One Senior Formula.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: scabs all over  :(
customer_reviews.text: If your dog has skin issues or ear infection problems, don't buy this. My dog had a MAJOR skin reaction to this food. I was hoping it would be good. The reviews were good so I was hoping it would be a good fit for my dog. However, like anything in life, one size does NOT fit all. I had to go back to his old food. He was one HUGE welt of scabs (even on his tail!), he stunk, it smelled like his skin was rotting, and his ears were chronically infected. Buy with caution. PS. He's back to his normal, beautiful skin and ears now. No more itching, no more scabs.
customer_reviews.author: BumblB

customer_reviews.title: My old gal loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 1/2 yrs. old mini Aussie, I switched her to this brand about a year ago and the changes have been amazing! Her weight is healthy which is something we struggled with and tried several other brand. It has help with her hips which were stiff, her coat looks wonderful, she has tons of energy and wants to play vs been a couch potato on the old brands dog food. Even my friends are surprised at the changes. Thanks for the great brand of dog food!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food....
customer_reviews.text: Purine One SmartBlend Vibrant Maturity Adult 7+ is the only food that I can feed my dog without his allergies flaring up. I used to buy really expensive grain- free dog foods w/ different meat content in attempt to deal with his food allergies, but they never seemed to make a difference. This has saved me money & kept him noticeably free of allergic reaction. He really enjoys the taste, too. I have been using this food for about 8 months & he seems to be acting like he did when he was a bit younger. (He is 11 years old.). I started using this food on the personal recommendation of a vet tech.at his clinic.& have not regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Smith

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My older cocker spaniels (12-14) LOVE this food. It also seems to do them some good as they are more energetic and slimmer than before. These are rescue dogs, who had been abused in their previous lives, so I want to make sure that they are spoiled, happy, and healthy (my last rescue cocker lived to the ripe old age of 18!). In truth, I do jazz the food up a bit . . . a tbls of canned, some water, heat in the microwave, and make a gravy. They can't wait for their meals.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Belteau

customer_reviews.title: My dog used to like it.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Like the previous brand, this Purina ONE changed the kibble sizes. The kibbles from the previous bag is shown in the first photo. The new bag has a mix of large and regular size kibbles shown in the second photo. My dog will leave the larger kibbles in his dish. Now I’m looking for another brand for him. My dog likes this one. The previous brand changed the size of the kibbles - some were larger than the regular size. My dog wouldn’t eat the larger size ones. He has been eating all his kibble since I switched. We are both happy.
customer_reviews.author: AliKatt

customer_reviews.title: She is doing great. Her weight has not change in 8+ years
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Aussie has been on Purina One SmartBlend now for about 2 years. She is doing great. Her weight has not change in 8+ years. 2 months ago I ran out of my Amazon supply and while awaiting my next shipment I bought a small bag from a local retailer. I noticed that the giblets were slightly larger and the bag had very few crumbs. When my Amazon 30 lb bag arrived on time I discovered that it had a huge amount crumbs throughout the bag and that the giblets were indeed smaller?? Should I buy smaller bags from Amazon or buy locally to get the appearance of fresher food and less crumbs?? Looking for an answer??
customer_reviews.author: Superchief

customer_reviews.title: The Old Gal Likes It!
customer_reviews.text: I can't judge flavor of the dog food! But the old gal can only eat canned food and actually refused to eat Science Diet and a few other more expensive foods that I am certain have what would be judged as better quality. But Purina knows pets so I'm confident they're not trying to kill her to save a penny; wouldn't be very good for their core business. And she seems to really like it. I thank her for saving me a lot of money because this is unbelievably affordable compared to what I was feeding her.
customer_reviews.author: Bklovr

customer_reviews.title: Good Food for Senior Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My older German Short-Haired Pointer Mix use to barf just about everyday. I brought her to a couple vets but they couldn't find anything wrong. The last Vet I went to drew blood and did X-Rays, and ($400.00 later) again found nothing wrong with her, and even stated how good her labs and X-rays looked for an older dog! The Vet did recommend Purina One Smart Blend, Vibrant Maturity, Senior Formula and it has made a huge difference! No more barfing! In fact she seems more active since eating this blend and is now back to chasing our Dachshund around the yard for the ball. Great dog food (the Dachshund likes it, too)!
customer_reviews.author: Angelofmrcy

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference with our lab
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old lab was gaining weight on the recommended amount of her old food. Our vet suggested a senior formula which our local stores just don't carry. Not long after we started giving her this food we noticed she was sneaking less food and also losing weight! She is almost down to her 2 year old size, and she is getting frisky again. Love this food and we have no plans to try any other.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh B

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: As my dog is entering his senior years, my vet recommended that I move him to a senior dog food that would be easier on his stomach. This is the second bag that I have ordered from Amazon and I have always received a fresh bag, no rips, and my dog eats this along with his wet food with no problems. Thanks again to the Amazon staff for all that you have done over the last weeks to ensure continued delivery of items needed during the quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: MNL

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutrition for my Old Man
customer_reviews.text: I have an eleven-year-old pit lab mix and he was having issues with energy, joint stiffness, and just wasn't his spunky self. I have been feeding him this for a few months now and I am very impressed with the positive effects it has had on him. He loves the taste and it is easy for him to digest. I have also noticed he has more energy and he is back to being himself, playing and running. I also love that I can get the 30 lb bag delivered to my door at a much lower price than my local stores. Subscribed!
customer_reviews.author: Clyanne Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Amazing For Older Dogs Missing Teeth
customer_reviews.text: Apparently the flavor is good. Our dogs love it. I recently had to switch our three free-feeding small dogs to senior food at the recommendation of our vet and we had been using the regular adult version of Purina One. The kibble is much smaller which is great because one of them is a 5 lb Chihuahua who had to have the majority of his teeth extracted but who refuses to eat differently then his two 10 lb friends. The value is also decent but we're feeding 25 collective pounds of dogs here so you'll want to buy the small size to see if your furry friends like it and adjust accordingly. I suspect they'll enjoy it :)
customer_reviews.author: Soulvei

customer_reviews.title: Great for my "elderly" triplets
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old "mature" triplets love the flavor and I feel that it's healthy for them. The pieces seem smaller than some kibbles and not quite as hard, which probably feels much better to their teeth and gums. Thank you Purina for remembering the "elderly".
customer_reviews.author: CLS.

customer_reviews.title: Happy 9 year old :)
customer_reviews.text: Puppy seems to enjoy the food, plus I've noticed she's lost a little weight since switching to the senior formula. She wasn't fat, but you can tell she was gaining weight being less active with her age. Overall I'm happy. I buy it online because 1 I hate how heavy the bag is at the store and 2 I can't find this item at my local store(s).
customer_reviews.author: Baugher

customer_reviews.title: Great value on a HUGE bag
customer_reviews.text: I had to rate the flavor, and while I have not personally tried it, my dog seems to think it is awesome. The bag was huge and it was a good value for the money. I ordered while early in quarantine and we are still working our way through that bag! Normally, my furbaby would get a grain free and much more expensive food, but it was impossible to find at that time. I am not sure if I would buy the HUGE bag again (she is a small fat dog!) but it would be great for homes that go through dog food quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Zerberbaby

customer_reviews.title: My dogs won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: This very well may be good dog food. However, it is the only dogfood my 2 terriers have ever not eaten. It has 2 colors, a dark brown and a light brown. My dogs will only eat the dark brown pieces and will pick through the entire bowl, leaving every light brown piece. I dumped half the bag out because of this. (By the way, nothing came and ate the light brown pieces out of the yard. Not opossums, not raccoons, not rats or mice, NOTHING. The rain eventually washed it away.) There may be a very hungry, not picky dog that will enjoy this dogfood, but not my pups.
customer_reviews.author: allsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Drastically reduces gas and healthier than Dog Chow
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've been feeding my dogs for quite a while. We used to buy the green bag of "Dog Chow" until my lab started having terrible gas. We tried the Purina One and she has next to no gas now. My vet agrees that this is healthier for her too. I will buy this again and suggest you try it
customer_reviews.author: mark pipetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Purina ONE SmartBlend Vibrant Maturity Senior 7+ Formula Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs, a10yr GSD and a 7yr who-knows-what Mutt pupper and they aren't picky. I've never had issues with quality (ie mold, clumps, harder than anything pieces) and its a nice mixture of soft chicken vs kibbles. I have to soak the kibbles in water every so often for my dogs because they either need more water in their diets my dogs personal issue comes up where the food needs to be softer, but I've found that these won't expand, so I don't have to worry about bloat or expansion in their stomachs. My dogs are pretty much food vacuums, so I haven't have any issues with this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: nancy e slavens

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs nauseous.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, but for starters the food smells badly... in thinking some dogs may like this, served it anyway. My English Bull Terrier (95 pounds, in perfect health) began getting nauseous after a few days on this food - we could tell he was a bit off. We put it down to maybe eating something outside he shouldn't have... Today, he started being sick with thick yellow/ white slime. I recognised the smell... same as the dog food. My little Frenchie faired better, but still: bad breath (as if we needed that), and bad stool... This stuff gets a good rating; but I can only describe my own experiences. All remaining cans now in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old terrier/chihuahua mix. She has trouble eating bigger sized food pieces, and this food is smaller which helps. My dog was gaining a lot of weight after her doggy sister passed away, and this food actually helped her lose weight. She is a free range eater and her weight is managed easily with this food. She has energy and her coat is soft and fluffy. If you have a small geriatric dog , I highly recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke509

customer_reviews.title: 1 dog wont eat it, the other chokes on it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will eat ANYTHING...except this food. They will eat broccoli, asparagus, and celery, but one of my dogs would wait until almost dinner time to eat his breakfast and the other dog chokes on this food. So...I was forced to make a change. Additionally, as I switched them over and eased them into the new food, these dogs, who are normally garbage disposals, would leave this food in their bowls and only eat the new food. I reluctantly (due to price) switched to Blue Buffalo Basics, which is also grain-free. I only share that to let you know it wasn't like they went from grain-free to delectable wet dog food! 2 stars simply for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for my babies at a price I can manage
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 German Shepherds. One is a genetic nightmare and needs a higher quality diet in order to digest and absorb nutrients properly. Purina Dog Chow wasn't quite good enough as I was feeding her 11 cups daily and she was LOSING weight. I tried the Purina One and she finally started to gain healthy weight back! I have kept them on Purina One and changed to this Vibrant Maturity Diet when my youngest turned 7. Purina One is a great diet at an affordable price. I wish Purina made this in a 50# bag. My pups go through this one in 2 weeks! They love it!
customer_reviews.author: KnE1400

customer_reviews.title: Can find it at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really comment on flavor, but my 2 seniors seem to love it! The senior maturity is VERY hard to find, for whatever reason & Amazon carries it! This last order took me a month+ to get it as I guess it wasn’t an “essential”! So, I had to make a 20 mile round trip to a store that had 1 bag left, in the middle of the stay-at-home deal! Guess feeding your dogs is not essential!! Maybe Purina was inundated!!!
customer_reviews.author: GEEG5

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My dog who normally takes his time eating, just gobbles this up. Update: my chihuahua and pomeranian both have had a skin reaction. To the point the are both itching and have scabs on their back right above their tail. They have been itching like crazy. The only thing different is they are eating this food. Im switching back to their old brand to see if it was caused by the food.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how it tastes personally, but my dogs love it and gobble it up so I assume it tastes great. I wish it was cheaper. I have to give wet food twice a day to two seniors in order to give them meds and I have to buy a lot of wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Was great, but now... too many tender morsels.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this food since 2015. It was well balanced between the crunchy bites and tender morsels. Last three times, the tender morsels are like the 65% to 75% of the bag. These morsels aren't my dog's favorite, but was tolerable in the past. However, now it's too many tender morsels. Thinking to try another food for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Yukiyu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My black lab was adopted in 2004 and was full grown. She seemed to be slowing down so I decided I would give this kibble a try. Within 3 days, she was moving better, less hesitant and loving her new food. She is still tenative about going up stairs but overall improvement has been wonderful. If you have an older dog, you might give this a try, you may be surprised as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Good Food for Older Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My babies (well not so baby anymore) loved this food. I was a little concerned at first because changing their food on them can upset their stomach but they all seemed to enjoy and not have any bowel issues. They especially love the little shredded bits. Now that they are getting older and need glucosamine in their diet, this formula just seemed perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jpark1983

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs skin is still recovering
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loved this food but it did terrible things to his skin. He’s become and itchy, licky, mess since we started him on this. We have since moved to a grain free dog food and cook some of his meals ourselves. We have seen a tremendous improvement in his skin and personality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great price that I could not resist.....I have two very large dogs who eat this along with dry food and they loved it! It was a great value for the price and if you comparison shop you will see that compared to grocery store prices you get this delivered to your door, cheaper and no having to carry around heavy bags of dog food groceries!
customer_reviews.author: ralfie

customer_reviews.title: No more UTI's
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to try this, because my 13 year old lab kept getting UTI's, and had to go on Proin, which she hates! Not only does she LOVE this kibble/crunchy mixture, but since changing over, she hasn't had a single UTI. And I am always careful about what I feed her. She seems to have more energy, and wants to walk, these days. This is no more expensive than what she was on, but it has less ingredients, and seems to be easily digested, as well.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Great senior formula
customer_reviews.text: Contains medium chain triglycerides for cognitive support, the same as the Pro Plan Bright Mind line, but for less. It likely doesn't have the same MCT levels as the Pro Plan, but for the price (vs. Bright Mind tubs), it is a good complementary food. I feed this as a topper along with Bright Mind kibble. Dogs love it and the ingredients are good.
customer_reviews.author: Gurg

customer_reviews.title: ONE Vibrant Maturity is Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have bred and shown German Shepherd Dogs for 45 years. Purina is an excellent producer of quality dog food. We now use Purina ONE for all ages of dogs, and the Vibrant Maturity 7+ for all of our oldsters. The dogs love it. It helps with digestion; stools pass gently. I highly recommend it for old timers!
customer_reviews.author: DaMerz

customer_reviews.title: All 3 of my dogs love this food!
customer_reviews.text: A healthy and reasonably priced dog food! I've got 1 med/lg & 2 lg dogs so I go thru a great deal of dog food so the larger the bag, the better! I LOVE that I can take advantage "subscribe & save" program & no longer have to go to a store, pick up to put in cart/trunk/house plus pour into a storage container to keep fresh! I have 5 lumbar & 4 cervical fused vertebrae, Lupus (SLE) & rheumatoid arthritis. Combine all that & you can understand how much more convenient it is to have this size dog food bag delivered 2 at a time right outside of my front door!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it and its small kibble size
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 old large dogs and the small kibble size of this senior dog food has made it much easier for them to eat it. I could have bought a kibble for small dogs but it was more expensive. They love this food and are doing well on it, but I have a hard time finding it in local stores so I was pleased to see it here..
customer_reviews.author: Carla D

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 year old Shih Tzu who's pretty healthy, but started having trouble digesting his dry food. He's been eating the Turkey-Barley for a week and a half with no stomach upsets. He eats it right up. Normally, he would be a grazer. When I opened the first can, I was surprised at how it smells good and not so dog food-ish
customer_reviews.author: djaz

customer_reviews.title: To much crumb dust in this bag.
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this a few times with zero problems, this last bag we bought we have to throw away. There is so much crumb dust in it we can not feed our dogs this, all it does is make them hack. Not sure if we will order this any more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brand Townsend

customer_reviews.title: cans dinted up in case
customer_reviews.text: came fast, was what I ordered but most of the cans were dented up. don't know why. looked ok in the shipping. wondered it they were a dent and scratch sale. dog likes well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Red

customer_reviews.title: Good Decision.
customer_reviews.text: I put 4 stars because how would I know how it taste as far as flavor goes. On another note, my dogs are eating. I say this because I have a 9yr old Lab and 12 year old Puggle. They are starting to slow down & would not eat their Purina Beneful dog food they have been on for years. This change has been a good one for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy J. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: He's playing!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yo dog loves this! He's a picky eater, even still. Takes a mouthful, sets it on the floor & picks out only the ones he likes the best. Then tries to get me to fill the bowl again. If I ignore him, he ends up eating the other half. But the best part is he seems to be more alert. Instead of just sleeping all day, he goes from window to window watching everything going on in the neighborhood. And for the first time since I got him 4 years ago, he's playing with a toy! Spontaneously! Ordering a 2nd bag right now.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyjeans

customer_reviews.title: Senior dog food
customer_reviews.text: My big guy is 9 yrs old these days. My last "puppy." We had a family beagle that lived to be 20ish! My shih-tzu lived to be almost 14.5yrs old. I'm not crediting it all here, but I'm not saying that this didn't play a factor, either. At times, we fed from 3 different bags. THIS bag has been in my home for years. 😁 My boys were/are always happy & healthy. They never knew/know hungry!🤟🏼🤞🏼
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend 👌
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is kinda high in price for me, but it is a premium dog food. My Veterinarian says it's good for older dogs. My German Shepard likes it. It gives her a real pep in her step, and alot of energy. Her coat doesn't shed as bad now, and her eyes are a lot clearer. She is more alert too. Older dogs joints tend to slow them down as they get older, from discomfort. With this food, you wouldn't know that my dog is 9 years old..... she runs around like a 2 year old now... I recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Knife slit in my dog food bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived with a slit in the middle of the bag. I don’t know if it it was a manufacturer error or if the delivery person put it a slit in it. Either way I wasn’t satisfied with receiving my dog food that way. I’m still going to keep the bag (because my dog doesn’t have any food), but will weigh out my options ordering again from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Ruiz-M.

customer_reviews.title: My Westie likes it
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with the kibble is the soft pieces draw the dog in to eat them first. He picks thru the hard pieces and makes a mess on the floor to eat the soft pieces first. I have to pick them up and put them back in the bowl so as not to waste the food. He does eat the rest though too.
customer_reviews.author: AGWright

customer_reviews.title: Good value good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding purina one to my shepherd since she was a baby. She was on their large breed but switched her to the vibrant maturity a few years ago. She is now 12 years old. She has done well on it and seems to like it. She isn't picky when it comes to food but she woofa this stuff down.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W

customer_reviews.title: good food
customer_reviews.text: My 14 years old dog was having problems with his Nutro dry food the Veterinarian put him in a prescribe wet food diet and probiotics but buying the food at their office is expensive he is doing good with this food I mixed with plain white rice he already finished 12 cans and his tummy is doing good
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Lady

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our Veternarian
customer_reviews.text: Our vet, when asked about dog food, made the comment that Purina spends more money than anyone else in the industry on quality and testing .... and that some of the other 'big name' alternatives are more marketing companies that sell dog food than they are dog food companies.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend giving this a try
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old hound dog was overweight and arthritic and had a hard time getting around. I put her on this food and she lost 20 pounds and started acting like a 2 year old. She was able to go on walks again and run around. She has since past but I was so blessed to have two years of a vital, happy and playful dog again. I am not claiming it will be this way for every dog but I highly recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great value for older dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the recommendation of my vet. I have always bought Science Diet, but this is a bit cheaper and supposedly great food. I have began mixing it 50/50 with science diet and my lab seems to love it. Most dogs like food anyway, but it has the bits and pieces that look different that I assume tastes good and peaks interest.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs are a little over 10years old. I have been feeding them this dog food for a few years now and they seem to enjoy it. The pieces are a little smaller, making it easier for them to chew. I've always felt that Purina One is a reputable brand that is safe for my fur-babies.
customer_reviews.author: BirdNet9

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved Purina ONE and I could always depend on the quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to feed Purina ONE Smartblend to my dog and she loved this. She has since passed but Purina kept her healthy, happy to eat and was also great to use as treats instead of high calorie treats.
customer_reviews.author: am1

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I can rate the flavor...lol But my dog likes it..
customer_reviews.text: The food has actual pieces of meat and seems to work well with Nella's digestive system. She's 10 now and I have to buy her senior stuff and make sure she's not eating crap food. She likes it a lot, devours it a little too fast. This might be her new go-to dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia

customer_reviews.title: Morsels are smaller than
customer_reviews.text: These morsels are smaller than my last bag but my dog seems to like it the same, Turds look fine. That’s really the test!
customer_reviews.author: BarryDinSmoke

customer_reviews.title: Dog had a bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving my 17 year mini Doxie Purina One ground for years Never an issue. Saw maturity formula and thought that might be better for him. Big mistake! After eating some in the morning, he hunched his back, appeared disoriented, and yelped as if in pain. He looked very bloated as well. Switched back to his regular formulation and he’s back to his old self again. Will never purchase this formulation ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Borkowski

customer_reviews.title: This price is great and the delivery is the best part as now ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has saved me a ton of $$$ not to mention the agony of lifting a 30lb bag of dog food into a cart, then into the car, and then hauling it into the house. This price is great and the delivery is the best part as now I only carry it from the front door into the house. Consider me one very happy Amazon customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jean White

customer_reviews.title: My 12 yr old dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My black lab mix likes Purina One so I decided I should try the senior version since she is 12 and has digestive issues. She really likes this food, she will eat it plain, which says something since she is spoiled on healthy people food. :) I had some old Beneful food in her dish, she ate around it. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Long time user of Purina products
customer_reviews.text: Purina products have been feeding my dogs for over 50 years. Fortunately all my dogs have lived long and healthy lives. I do still occassionaly try something else and shift between Purina products, Purina One has been excellet quality and my 11 year old beagle love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally V

customer_reviews.title: My dogs health
customer_reviews.text: One dog got horrible stomach aches from it. The other dog got sick and refused to eat it again. Very disappointed. Wish I could get my money back....still have 5 cans.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne mickow

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have to go to Walmart!!
customer_reviews.text: Same dog food I always buy, however it saved me a trip to Walmart and that's worth the extra $0.08 I paid for it, I will be making a weekly order from now on, extremely happy! Update, it's actually cheaper than Walmart, $18.62 from Amazon, $19.88 at Walmart. All 3 of my dogs dogs love the food too
customer_reviews.author: Brian S Woods

customer_reviews.title: dogs love the food and they act younger
customer_reviews.text: have a dog with pancreatitis and this is the only food that doesn't mess with that and doesn't make her sick. They also feel better and get around better and more alert. The only problem I had with this order it took over 8 days to get it . But it is worth it cause none of the stores carry it .
customer_reviews.author: karen wilson

customer_reviews.title: Dog broke out in hives, scabs, and very itchy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product if your dog has allergies or is sensitive. My dog has hives all over her body and has been itchy and chewing her tail one week into adding this to her dry food. I would give it zero stars if I could as it has cost me lots of money at the vet. Skip this food!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This is great food, based on nutrition and quality I'm giving ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great food, based on nutrition and quality I'm giving this 5 stars. however, my dog (9r old pitbull) didn't seem to prefer this one as much as the Purina One Lamb or Chicken that I usually buy. The pieces are smaller, which may be good for an older dog. My dog just didn't seem to like it as much as the bigger pieces. I bought this one time, but I switched back to the other Purina One Lamb or Chicken flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purina makes such good products and to have it on a subscription order, wow, what can I say it shows up at the door. No hauling it in and out of cart and vehicle. Thanks for offering this in a subsciption way of ordering a great product.
customer_reviews.author: tobb

customer_reviews.title: Our cavachon we wolfs it down
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, we're into Purina 7+ products. Our dog will eat anything, no issues there. Only one dented can, appears to not have impacted the taste. Our cavachon wolf's it down, we mix a tablespoon with a full serving of dry food
customer_reviews.author: E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brands of food for my lab, and He likes this one far better than any of the other premium brands I've tried. With all other brands, when he cut a fart it would clear the room. This brand doesn't cause any issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Haines

customer_reviews.title: What my old girls love...
customer_reviews.text: The best dog food for my two old girls! Roxy is my 12 year old Black Lab, and Bailey is her 11 year old Chocolate Cocker sister...Purina One Vitality is the only food I've been able to feed them that they keep eating. It hasn't caused either of my old girls to have stomach or stool issues, and their skin and coat look fabulous. Repeat buyer and have been feeding this product mixed with Purina One canned grain free for about 3 years....Hope it helps my fur babies enjoy their golden years.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Green

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Previously I used to feed my dog Purina dog chow from Walmart, but with him now being 9 years old he started to get a little skinny, so I decided I'd switch to this and just see if he likes it. Not only did he like it better, he looks much nicer and is full with energy as if he's still a young dog!
customer_reviews.author: Shan Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost to feed your aging dog a quality, but not bank account wrecking, dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for my aging border collie. In a month the excess fat layers vanished. Highly recommend this dog food, and will buy it again. It's high content of protein makes all the difference in the world. If you use it, you, too, will notice a difference. Also, it eliminated her soft stools. An extra bonus when picking up after her.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it - that’s important to me
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yo Golden Retriever loves it! She tries to convince me I hadn’t fed her the first few days after switching from Purina Chicken and Rice formula. Now that she middle-aged dog - I want to give her good food into her “golden” years.
customer_reviews.author: KatM

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like Purina One. I usually get the regular adult choice of chicken and rice, but they really seemed to like this choice better. Of course I can’t attest to how good this food is for my dog as most dog is made from crap ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Moschara

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't wait!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was carrying by the cart. Our big dog couldn't stand its smell and followed her. After she opened the bag and started putting inside the dog food container. Our dog wanted samples. Every time I dropped pieces. He was so happy to taste them.
customer_reviews.author: John Coley

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is good dog food for my 12 years old dog. The pieces are small and has some soft pieces and hard pieces mixed together, also has some ingredients that essential for the senior dog in it. My dog just loves it. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaew

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the flavor of this. Once they were on it for about a month, my husband and I noticed that they had both lost weight. The only thing we changed was the food. We’ve always used Purina (started on Puppy Chow, on Dog Chow till they were 11 - then we found this. Would have started them sooner if I would have known about it). I love this food as my dogs do seem happier and healthier on it. The vet I recently changed to was shocked to learn my dogs are 12, she said they act like they are around 8. Thank you Purina for making great dog food!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Dog won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Dog would not eat it. Have been feeding her Purina One Natural Lamb and Rice and switched to the senior for my12 yr old dog. I couldn't get the regular stuff from Prime anymore so I thought I'd try this. She won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Tripps

customer_reviews.title: Purina Pro Healthy Weight dog food my dogs love.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 2 dogs healthy. Their weight is controlled. My dogs love to eat it. I would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: jnaas1952

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves This
customer_reviews.text: He is a 12 yr old Standard Poodle and still acts like a puppy***most of the time. I think this stuff helps. He is as healthy of a dog as you'll ever meet. He used to throw up a lot when I tried other more expensive brands, but my vet recommended this and he hasn't had any tummy troubles since I started feeding him this.
customer_reviews.author: clynch

customer_reviews.title: My Doggos Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched my two, 8 year old dogs to this food from Purina One Smartblend Lamb & Rice, and they love it. Purina always has delivered a great product, glad to have found this one to help them as they get older!
customer_reviews.author: Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this product.. he has lost a little weight.. a good thing.. 12 yrs old.. has a lot of renewed energy.. not that a jack Russell is ever needs more energy. He is getting back some of the Mischievous behavior .. good to see but not fun to deal with. the Big chunks of chicken .. is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and pets love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 12 year old Springer and he really loved it. I bought it for the healthy ingredients and mostly for The glucosamine that I truly has helped for their elderly aches and pains. It may seem pricey, but a little goes a long way and my dogs never wasted any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love this food. All 3 are picky eaters, so I was surprised. The bites are a perfect size. It smelled very fresh when I opened the bag. Bindi, Nova & Davey are huge fans .... a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Use this for all ages?!
customer_reviews.text: I can see results already! Coat improved, frisky, and overall improved health! My pup is a six year old rescue, but the Brewer's yeast is doing its job also, but w/o the gas!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Was great til the raised the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy & my dog loved it! However the proved doubled after I bought the first bag! The smallest bag was the price I paid for the large bag! I changed his food to another brand that I could afford.
customer_reviews.author: LilLeo

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find this product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could find this vibrant maturity in my local store, but I can't. So Amazon it is. My dog is almost 10 and he doesn't always eat 2 meals a day. He's a lab mix with hip problems. I don't know that this food has helped him loosen up, but I'm pretty pleased with the Purina One brand. I can't afford the high end foods, so I'm glad to have this available.
customer_reviews.author: StephReeves

customer_reviews.title: Good Food (Senior Wet)
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ingredients and taste (according to my dogs.) I had to feed Purina Proplan canned for a while as they lost interest on the other Purina One cans. This has sparked their interest again, and you can't beat the prices that they offer it at, especially with Prime. I mix this with Eukanuba dry and my dogs have had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not My Dog's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a product to help our pointer/boxer mix, but she just hasn't cared for this product, and unfortunately we ran out of her normal product from Amazon and were unable to mix it with this new one. Have got the previous product on order and will try mixing with this one to see if it will help as this product is advertised to have great benefits for dogs as they age.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: We have two older English bulldogs and they have done great on this food. They have no issues with digestion on this (which is a big deal) and it seems to have helped control weight and attitude. Really great!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: allergy
customer_reviews.text: my dog couldnt eat it. vet said he was allergic to it. not sure why
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dry Food for the Elder Dog
customer_reviews.text: My Little Buddy is in his teens now and needs the special 'mature dog' formula. Also, the smaller pieces make it much easier for him to chew. It smells so good I've been tempted to try a bite myself!
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitt Sharp

customer_reviews.title: My best friend Lucy
customer_reviews.text: My best friend Lucy, loves the chicken and rice vibrant food. She is 12 years old, and I've been using this food for the purpose of having her stay in the best shape as possible. She aced her annual exam last month, compliments from vet that she is doing wonderful and looks great for her age. Is it the food? I do not know, but I believe it does help keep her vibrant and beautiful. I recommend this product, and will continue to use it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs ate it up, and didn’t get tired of taste or flavor
customer_reviews.text: Dogs ate it up, and didn’t get tired of taste or flavor
customer_reviews.author: J Chester

customer_reviews.title: Kibbles for everybody
customer_reviews.text: All the dogs out solutely love this food oh, I was extremely happy with it. Unfortunately my very old 18 and 1/2 year old dog his teeth are too far gone to be able to chew these. But all the other dogs loved it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Willson

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food for the older dog
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food for the older dog. It isn't as high in fat as some dog foods. Our dog loves it and eats every bit. Amazon prime pantry keeps me well stocked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this one has been the best. Been purchasing for the past 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Doggy loves her food. We struggled to find a brand and type that was gentle enough for her sensitive stomach, this one has been the best. Been purchasing for the past 2 years. Absolutely LOVE that I can order through amazon and have someone else deliver the giant bag (sorry postman!)
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: dogs cerebral glucose increase with age, making them 'dull' and less energetic in their senior years. Purina addressed this with this formulation of Senior + to help reduce these glucose levels and allow one to enjoy their 'normal' pet's prowess to continue into their healthy older age.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: But they all like the food and they are healthy according to their ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs coats are shiny and they are healthy on this kibble. I add a little warm water because our dogs tend to gobble their food and choke a little sometimes if I don't wet it. Doesn't take much to stop that from happening. But they all like the food and they are healthy according to their vetirinarian.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great food for our small Hurd!!
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by our vet for our 3 chihuahuas and 1 Rat terrier mix. Feeding this only for a year now has resulted in healthy coats and brighter eyes with no dry skin patches or itchies from any of the 4! Which makes for happy people!!
customer_reviews.author: JackF

customer_reviews.title: My dogs spit it out and make eew faces
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won’t eat this. I don’t know if they are reluctant to admit they’re seniors or it just doesn’t taste good. I had to go back to True Instinct.

customer_reviews.title: For my senior, arthritic dog
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year old tripod has serious arthritis in his remaining back leg. Of course, he’s on medication, but I really think switching to this Senior formula has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Dudleysmama

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two older dogs who are picky eaters and some foods don't agree with their digestive system. This brand is easy on their digestion and they like it. A win win!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hauldren

product_meta.title: Purina ONE SmartBlend Vibrant Maturity Senior 7+ Formula Dog Food
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:31.1 lb. BagGive your senior dog the nutrition that he needs along with the taste that he loves with Purina ONE SmartBlend Vibrant Maturity Adult 7+ Formula dry dog food. Chicken is the #1 ingredient, providing a high-quality source of protein for his daily diet, and 0% fillers means that every ingredient in this recipe has a purpose. Enhanced botanical oils in every serving nourish and help promote mental sharpness, and a natural source of glucosamine helps to support his healthy joints so that he can maintain his sense of adventure. This senior dog food features a highly-digestible formula, so more nutrition goes to work inside of your dog. A combination of meaty morsels and crunchy kibble gives him the taste and texture he loves, and 100% complete nutrition offers a smart solution for your older dog's feeding routine. Get your senior dog what he needs when he needs it with a few clicks of your mouse when you place an order for this Purina ONE SmartBlend dry dog food formula today. Calorie Content (fed)(ME) - 3786 kcal/kg, 363 kcal/cup
feature_bullets: High-Quality Protein, Including Real Chicken As The #1 Ingredient, Supports The Heart And Muscles
Protein-Rich, Tender, Meaty Morsels Plus Crunchy Kibble For A Taste He Loves
31.1 Lb. Bag - Purina One Smartblend Vibrant Maturity Adult 7+ Formula Dry Dog Food

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
